mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board WHERE board_type = #{boardType}

select * from (select rownum as rnum, sb.* from (SELECT b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_area, b.reg_date, b.board_thumb, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_like bl WHERE bl.board_no = b.board_no) AS like_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_keep bk WHERE bk.board_no = b.board_no) AS keep_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM board_comment bc WHERE bc.board_no = b.board_no) AS report_count, (select member_IMAGE from member m where m.member_no = b.member_no) as member_IMAGE, (select MEMBER_NICKNAME from member m where m.member_no = b.member_no) as member_NICKNAME FROM board b where board_type=#{boardType}) sb) where rnum BETWEEN #{start} and #{end}
